attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Inheritance Tax now includes ordinary people in ordinary semis in ordinary towns. The government is in effect stealing from under families noses what has been worked hard and saved and scrimped years and years for. It is obscene and unjust and mean mean mean. It demotivates people. It makes people homeless. It is causing people sleepless nights. It penalises the less well off as usual.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
